short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block distracting LinkedIn feeds and news to focus on your professional growth and networking.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Maximize your productivity on LinkedIn with LinkedIn Feed Blocker 🌟, the premier Chrome extension for professionals and job seekers alike. Tailor your LinkedIn environment to suit your professional needs by eliminating distractions from feeds and news.

Key Features:
Eliminate LinkedIn Feeds 🚫: Enhance your focus by removing the clutter of constant updates. Perfect for maintaining a distraction-free LinkedIn experience.
Block LinkedIn News 🔕: Block out LinkedIn’s news to concentrate solely on networking and career opportunities.

User Support and Feedback:
Experiencing difficulties or have suggestions? I'm committed to continuous improvement and value your feedback 📬. Reach out to me at darrentu.questions@gmail.com.

Join Our Developer Community:
Dive deeper into customization and contribute to feature enhancements by visiting my GitHub page 🖥️: https://github.com/darrentu/Feed-Blocker-for-LinkedIn.

Why Choose LinkedIn Feed Blocker?
Designed with the professional user in mind, LinkedIn Feed Blocker helps you maintain a laser focus on your career goals by cutting down on non-essential content 🎯. Install today and redefine your professional browsing experience on LinkedIn!
